ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:0.5_0: The training rule on getting nuns to massage
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.2_0: the nuns were getting other nuns to massage and rub them.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.3_0: People who were walking about the dwellings saw this, and they complained and criticized them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.4_0: “How can nuns have other nuns massage and rub them? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.7_0: “How can nuns have other nuns massage and rub them?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.13_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun gets a nun to massage her or to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.8_0: if she gets her to massage her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.1.10_0: if she gets hold of her, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc90:2.2.6_0: The seventh training rule is finished.
